fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, External Relations, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: We are working on Refuges, Roma Community and LGBT during this time we are followed EP recommendation.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
We challenge the abuse of power, oppression and discrimination as a means of reducing poverty in the different country in world.  
We motivate and organize people on issues of human rights   – many people, who go on to challenge their conditions and demand more influence over their lives.  
Our objective is to build strong civil societies where the power is shared by many and the resources are distributed fairly, where people have power to determine their own lives, influence their country’s development and, together, eradicate poverty. 
Welcome to ECHR's world!
relevant_communication: We lobbying and advocate to European leadership and collaboration with like-minded Council of Europe and European Delegation to vigorously oppose dictators and oppression. We amplify the voices of those struggling for Human Rights in repressive societies and counter authoritarian efforts to weaken international scrutiny of their regimes.
